short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a dark screen over everything

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A translucent screen will be added over your screen with a click of a button in your toolbar. Other Dark Mode extensions use high contrast which could mess with the overall look of websites. This extension does not change a websites' styling.
